Title: Love the new grading interface
Description: The updated grading interface is so much cleaner and easier to use. Great work!

Title: Too many clicks to configure levels
Description: Setting up differentiation levels requires clicking through 5 different screens. Very tedious.

Title: Configure levels button sometimes unresponsive
Description: Clicked the Configure Levels button 3 times before it responded. Frustrating when you're in a hurry.

Title: Level configuration is time consuming
Description: Spent 25 minutes trying to set up 3 ability levels for one assessment. This should take 5 minutes max.

Title: Student progress reports are excellent
Description: The new progress visualization helps me identify struggling students quickly

Title: Confusing interface for assigning to groups
Description: After configuring levels I couldn't figure out how to actually assign them to my student groups. UI not intuitive.

Title: Too many steps to create differentiated assignment
Description: The workflow has way too many steps. I count 7 clicks minimum to get a differentiated assignment published.

Title: Assign to Groups screen is confusing
Description: The dropdown menus on the Assign to Groups screen don't clearly show which level goes to which group.

Title: Configure Levels screen freezes browser
Description: When I have more than 20 students the Configure Levels screen makes my browser very slow.

Title: Quick feedback feature is great
Description: Being able to give quick audio feedback directly in the app saves so much time

Title: Way too many clicks required
Description: I literally counted 12 clicks to publish one differentiated assessment. My colleague using competitor does it in 3.

Title: Time wasted on configuration
Description: I've now spent 3 hours this week just configuring differentiation levels. This is supposed to save me time!

Title: Group assignment UI misleading
Description: The UI shows a checkmark but the assignment didn't actually save. Had to redo the whole thing.

Title: Love the new resource library
Description: The expanded resource library has so many great materials I can use

Title: Differentiation workflow needs simplification
Description: The entire differentiation workflow is overly complex. Open -> Create -> Select -> Configure -> Assign -> Publish is too many steps.

Title: Level configuration takes forever
Description: Each time I configure levels the system takes 30+ seconds to respond. With 5 classes that's 10+ minutes of waiting.

Title: Dark mode please
Description: Would really appreciate a dark mode option for late night grading

Title: UI doesn't make sense for group assignment
Description: I have 3 groups and 3 levels but the interface doesn't make it obvious how to match them up.

Title: Student engagement metrics helpful
Description: The engagement tracking helps me see which students need more support

Title: Click fatigue is real
Description: By the end of setting up differentiated assignments for all my classes my hand hurts from all the clicking.

Title: Configure button requires double-click
Description: The Configure Levels button only works if I double-click it. Single click does nothing.

Title: Process takes too long
Description: What should be a 2 minute task takes me 15 minutes every time. The time adds up.

Title: Collaboration features work well
Description: Working with my co-teacher on shared assignments is seamless

Title: Excessive clicking required
Description: Need to reduce the number of clicks. Every other platform does this in fewer steps.

Title: Assign to Groups dropdown confusing
Description: Selected Group A for Level 1 but it saved as Level 2. The dropdowns are mislabeled or buggy.

Title: Bulk level configuration
Description: Need ability to configure all levels at once instead of one at a time

Title: Workflow is broken
Description: Spent 45 minutes trying to configure and assign differentiated levels. Eventually gave up and assigned same to all.

Title: Assessment templates save time
Description: Pre-built templates have cut my planning time significantly

Title: Too complicated UI for group assignment
Description: The Assign to Groups interface has too many options and not enough guidance. I always make mistakes.

Title: Clicking through screens is exhausting
Description: Open Assignments -> Click Create -> Select Content -> Open Differentiation -> Configure -> Assign -> Publish. Too many screens!

Title: Offline mode needed
Description: Need ability to grade when internet connection is spotty

Title: Wasted an hour on configuration
Description: Lost an entire prep period trying to configure differentiation. Students got undifferentiated work because I ran out of time.

Title: Love the analytics dashboard
Description: Data visualization of class performance is really well done

Title: UI elements overlap on Configure Levels
Description: On my laptop the configuration options overlap making it impossible to select the right levels.

Title: Multi-step process is a dealbreaker
Description: If configuring differentiation continues to require this many steps I'll go back to paper worksheets.

Title: Templates for differentiation levels
Description: Would love pre-set level configurations I can reuse

Title: Minutes turn into hours
Description: Setting up one week of differentiated assignments takes me 2+ hours. This needs to be 30 minutes max.

Title: Student portfolio feature excellent
Description: Digital portfolios showcase student growth beautifully

Title: Group assignment UI is counterintuitive
Description: The mental model for assigning levels to groups doesn't match how teachers think about differentiation.

Title: Navigation requires too many clicks
Description: Getting lost in the navigation between Configure Levels and Assign to Groups. Too many clicks to go back and forth.
